name: The New Resident
description:
People have been going missing, and it seems like they all have a connection to a company called ManneCorp. You decide to investigate, but you better watch your back.

Use your mouse to look around

Use WASD to move

Press enter to select a menu option

Press e to interact

Press space to use a flash bulb

This is a short game made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam.
